Name: LU 353 - Planning, BRONX SHEPHERDS (AKA CPE EQUITIES), Bronx (20165426 HAX)
Title: Resolution to approve an amendment to a previously approved urban development action area project located at Block 2662, Lot 10; Block 2668, Lots 30 and 33; Block 2669, Lots 6 and 47; Block 2685, Lot 48; Block 2799, Lot 18; Block 2869, Lot 142; Block 2877, Lot 268; Block 2879, Lots 68 and 69; Block 2890, Lot 17; Block 2892, Lot 38; Block 2903, Lots 3, 41, 43 and 44; Block 2934, Lots 23, 26, 29 and 31, Block 2971, Lots 10, 12 and 14; and Block 3776, Lot 44, Borough of the Bronx (L.U. No. 353; 20165426 HAX).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - April 20, 2016

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj By Council Members Greenfield and Dickens\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\b0\par
  \tab WHEREAS, the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development ("HPD") submitted to the Council on March 1, 2016 its request dated February 29, 2016 that the Council approve an amendment to a previously approved exemption area pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (\ldblquote Amended Exemption\rdblquote ) for property located at Block 2662, Lot 10; Block 2668, Lots 30 and 33; Block 2669, Lots 6 and 47; Block 2685, Lot 48; Block 2799, Lot 18; Block 2869, Lot 142; Block 2877, Lot 268; Block 2879, Lots 68 and 69; Block 2890, Lot 17; Block 2892, Lot 38; Block 2903, Lots 3, 41, 43 and 44; Block 2934, Lots 23, 26, 29 and 31, Block 2971, Lots 10, 12 and 14; and Block 3776, Lot 44, Community Districts 2, 3, 5, and 9, Borough of the Bronx (the \ldblquote Exemption Area\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\tab WHEREAS, HPD\rquote s request for the amendment is related to a previously approved City Council Resolution adopted on December 16, 2015 (Resolution No. 948, L.U. No. 303) (the \ldblquote Prior Resolution\rdblquote ) granting the Exemption Area a real property tax exemption pursuant to Section 420-c of the Real Property Tax Law and pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (the \ldblquote Previous Tax Exemption\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx662\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, HPD submitted to the Council on March 1, 2016 its request dated February 29, 2016 relating to the tax exemptions for the Exemption Area (\ldblquote The HPD Request\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx662\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Amended Exemption on April 4, 2016;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx662\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1772\tx4635\tx5154\tx6061\tx7368\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and financial implications and other policy issues relating to the Amended Exemption;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The Council approves the Amended Prior Resolution by (i) replacing the definition of \ldblquote Exemption Area\rdblquote  contained in subdivision (c)  of paragraph one and (ii) replacing the definition of \ldblquote Prior Exemption\rdblquote  contained in  subdivision (j) of paragraph one, with the following:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj (c)\tab\ldblquote Exemption Area\rdblquote  shall mean the real property located in the Borough of the Bronx, City and State of New York, identified as Block 2662, Lot 10; Block 2668, Lots 30 and 33; Block 2669, Lots 6 and 47; Block 2685, Lot 48; Block 2799, Lot 18; Block 2869, Lot 142; Block 2877, Lot 268; Block 2879, Lots 68 and 69; Block 2890, Lot 17; Block 2892, Lot 38; Block 2903, Lots 3, 41, 43 and 44; Block 2934, Lots 23, 26, 29 and 31, Block 2971, Lots 10, 12 and 14; and Block 3776, Lot 44 on the Tax Map of the City of New York.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj (j)\tab\ldblquote Prior Exemption\rdblquote  shall mean (a) the exemption from real property taxation pursuant to Section 420-c of the Real Property Tax Law for that portion of the Exemption Area located at Block 2903, Lots 3, 41, 43, and 44 and Block 2934, Lots 23, 26, 29, and 31, and (b) the exemption from real property taxation pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law for the portion of the Exemption Area located at Block 2685, Lot 48 and Block 3776, Lot 44, approved by the City Council, respectively, on June 7, 1999 (Res. No. 852) and May 16, 1995 (Res. No. 982).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on April 20, 2016, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\par
\par
